title: Ticket #4335: Add DAGMAN_IGNORE_JOB_LOG configuration option
description:
Create DAGMAN_IGNORE_JOB_LOG, default to False.

If (DAGMAN_DEFAULT_NODE_LOG ! Undefined && DAGMAN_IGNORE_JOB_LOG) Then "Do not write to log defined in node job submit file."

This avoids the problem of defining a log for the purpose non-DAG testing/use, but forgetting to remove it during DAG submission.

(Note: config macro name could be different -- I haven't thought about that yet.)
